name.title: Service name
name.description: Unique name for the Edge-LB service instance

zkHosts.description: The list of ZooKeeper servers for storing state (default = master.mesos:2181)

forcePull.description: Force pull the apiserver docker image when true

dcosAddress.title: DC/OS address
dcosAddress.description: DC/OS address for communication with adminrouter

dcosProtocol.title: DC/OS protocol
dcosProtocol.description: DC/OS protocol. Should be http for insecure mode.

metricsPrefix.title: The metrics prefix
metricsPrefix.description: The common prefix shared by all the metrics generated by Edge-LB

mesosAddress.title: Mesos address
mesosAddress.description: Mesos address for operator api task updates

mesosProtocol.title: Mesos protocol
mesosProtocol.description: Mesos protocol. Should be http for insecure mode.

mesosRateLimit.title: Mesos Rate Limit Interval
mesosRateLimit.description: The interval to limit mesos updates causing template rendering. Expressed as a `Duration` and parsed by `time.ParseDuration`.

mesosRateBurst.title: Mesos Rate Limit Burst
mesosRateBurst.description: The burst to limit mesos updates causing template rendering. Used as the `b` paramater to `rate.NewLimiter`. Should be left at 1.

secretName.title: Credential secret name (optional)
secretName.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

principal.title: Credential principal (optional)
principal.description: Name of the principal to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

mesosAuthNZ.title: Mesos authNZ control for pool schedulers
mesosAuthNZ.description: Defines whether the pool schedulers should try to authorize with Mesos or not. Should only be set to `false` when EdgeLB is running on DC/OS cluster in security mode `disabled`

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: The log level can be one of: debug, info, warn, error.

rpcVipPort.title: TCP port used by the VIP of the RPC server
rpcVipPort.description: The VIP port of the RPC server exposed by apiserver to communicate with Cloud Controller.

awsAccessKeyId.title: AWS access key ID (optional)
awsAccessKeyId.description: AWS access key ID to use with an AWS client

awsSecretAccessKey.title: AWS Secret access key (optional)
awsSecretAccessKey.description: AWS secret access key to use with an AWS client

awsRegion.title: AWS region (optional)
awsRegion.description: AWS region to use when creating an AWS client

defaultPoolTemplate.title: Default Pool Template
defaultPoolTemplate.description: Enable (default) or disable the default pool template

disableTLSAuth.title: Disable TLS auth
disableTLSAuth.description: Enable (default) or disable TLS auth for lbmgr
